00073 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::insertData(const unsigned char *x, int length)
00074 {
00075         if (dataLength - end < length)
00076                 makeSpace(length);
00077 
00078         memcpy(data + end, x, length);
00079         end += length ;
00080 }
00081 
00087 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer x)
00088 {
00089         insertData((unsigned char *)&x, 4);
00090 }
00091 
00097 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Double x)
00098 {
00099         insertData((unsigned char *)&x, 8);
00100 }
00101 
00107 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const unsigned char x)
00108 {
00109         insertData((unsigned char *)&x, 1);
00110 }
00111 
00117 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const bool x)
00118 {
00119         unsigned char b ;
00120         
00121         if (x)
00122                 b = 1 ;
00123         else
00124                 b = 0 ;
00125 
00126         packWithoutType(b);
00127 }
00128 
00134 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const char *const x)
00135 {
00136         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer l = strlen(x);
00137         
00138         packWithoutType(l);
00139         insertData((unsigned char *)x, l);
00140 }
00141 
00147 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::packWithoutType(const std::string x)
00148 {
00149         const char *y = x.c_str();
00150 
00151         packWithoutType(y);
00152 }

00246 inline std::string SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::typeString(SystemsBiologyWorkbench::DataBlockType x)
00247 {
00248         if (SystemsBiologyWorkbench::TerminateType > x || SystemsBiologyWorkbench::ListType < x)
00249                 return "garbage" ;
00250 
00251         static const char *typeStrings[] =
00252                 { "terminator", "byte", "integer", "double", "boolean", "string", "array", "list" };
00253 
00254         return typeStrings[x + 1];
00255 }
00256 
00263 inline const unsigned char *SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::getData(
00264         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer *x) const
00265 {
00266         if (x != NULL)
00267                 *x = end ;
00268 
00269         return data ;
00270 }
00271 
00278 inline unsigned char *SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockWriter::getDataCopy(SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer &length)
00279 {
00280         length = end ;
00281 
00282         return (unsigned char *)memcpy(new unsigned char[length], data, length);
00283 }
